content:
The v2-to-FHIR IG Proposal has been updated with a long description. It can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=76162533#v2toFHIR-LongDescription:. Given cancellation of HIMSS, I will be on the call next week to address any questions/suggestions. You can insert them as comments on the Confluence page as well ahead of the meeting.
Thank you!
